content.text: Write \(45\%\) as a fraction in its simplest form
One January day in Munich, the temperature at noon was \(3^{\circ}\mathrm{C}\)
Write down the difference between these two temperatures
Write down all the numbers displayed on your calculator
Write your answer to part (a) correct to 3 decimal places
Pedro and Eva do their homework
Pedro takes 84 minutes to do his homework
The ratio Pedro's time : Eva's time \(= 7:6\)
Work out the number of minutes Eva takes to do her homework
Write each of the following as a single vector
Use the information in the diagram to find the value of \(a\)
Do not use a calculator and show all the steps of your working
Sebastian ran a race in 11.4 seconds, correct to 1 decimal place
Complete the statement about the time, \(t\) seconds, that Sebastian took to run the race
Rearrange this equation to make \(b\) the subject
Here are the first four terms of a sequence
Write down an expression for the \(n\)th term
Find the value of \(x\) when \(- 7 < x < - 5\)
Write down the probability of Sachin's team **not** winning any match
In a season there are 40 matches
How many matches should Sachin's team expect to win in a season?
The probability of Sachin's team winning any match is 0.45
Complete each statement with the correct mathematical term
The perimeter of a square is \(28\mathrm{mm}\)
Work out the length of one side of the square
Calculate the volume of a cylinder with radius \(5.2 \text{cm}\) and height \(15 \text{cm}\)
Bruce invested $420 at a rate of \(4\%\) per year compound interest
Calculate the total amount Bruce has after 2 years
Give your answer correct to 2 decimal places
Martina changed 200 Swiss francs (CHF) into euros (€)
Give your answer correct to the nearest euro
Construct the perpendicular bisector of the line \(DE\)
In this question use a straight edge and compasses only
Leave in all your construction arcs
Which two of these have the same value?
Work out the probability that Marco throws a number less than 5
Marco throws a six-sided dice 27 times
The bar chart shows his results
